clues.text: Introduced in 1961, Charlie was this type of fish who bizarrely wanted to end up as product for StarKist

FLOTUS is short for this spouse
clues.answer: First Lady of the United States

Last name of the tennis player seenhere; the crocodilelogoon his coat would become a fashion icon

Ecuador & Colombia both have regions named for this man

Nickname for one very interested in the engines of Fairlanes or Fokkers

clues.answer: Lawrence of Arabia, or T.E. Lawrence

clues.text: It's this 1974 Jack Nicholson L.A.-set mystery, Jake
